    Cheff Scientist

    Food? Gimme! (Joey Tribbiani) üçù

    Cooking is how I care for people when words fail. If I ever made you one of these dishes, you know I love you. Here's my collection of international recipes, learned from YouTube, friends around the world, and lots of trial and error.

    The Signature Dishes

    Signature Shrimp Pasta

    My go-to comfort food. Perfectly cooked shrimp, garlic, white wine, and a secret blend of spices that I will never fully reveal.

    Secret-Recipe Salmon Bowl

    This took me months to perfect, with a sauce that people literally ask me to bottle and sell. Approved by my strict Persian Parents!

    Savory Ghormeh Sabzi

    This Persian stew is my soul food. It takes hours to make properly. If I made this for you, I REALLY love you.
